reviewText: Love AB! The disks are labeled odd. Each disk has 3 full episodes (the box labels each recipe in that episode)
Alton Brown is so easily understood an a pleasure to learn from.
as always very informational.  love it for high school students as it helps all learners no matter what level understand the concepts and in a way they enjoy.

Good Eats is the only show I have ever purchased on DVD. I watch all of them as I cook dinner. The only thing I'd be able to complain about is that this set has the THIRD different cover scheme. There are no outtakes or an "Ask Alton" segments, which is too bad, but it does have what you bought it for: three Good Eats episodes. Which are always excellent and worth watching again and again.
